qas.question: In what year was the modern City of New York founded?
In what year did the subway begin operation?
Portions of what modern-day borough were included in the County of New York?
The subway of New York was first available in what year?

context: In <a0_0>1898<a0_0/>, the modern City of New York was formed with the consolidation of Brooklyn (until then a separate city), the County of New York (which then included parts of <a2_0>the Bronx<a2_0/>), the County of Richmond, and the western portion of the County of Queens. The opening of the subway in <a1_0><a3_0>1904<a3_0/><a1_0/>, first built as separate private systems, helped bind the new city together. Throughout the first half of the 20th century, the city became a world center for industry, commerce, and communication.
